channel.title: Java hacker on server help! <------------
channel.description:
hello plzz help me a guy ruining my server he say he does it with jdk :s he can pickup items he want and cna unjail himself , and he can tele while jailed
hes is just a player and i never ave seen him before ;S and when i ipban him he just get other ip he said the problem was with pickup system in the source.java :S and i had to recode it... but idk howw :S plzz help cuz i closed my server for now cuz hes ruining itt :S he keeps spawning items and unjail himself and he can atk any npc like shops etc :S
he said he was a java pro and he did something with code a line and then some item spawnd on ground and he could pick it up... :s
plz help me with recoding pickup thing in source ( it isnt the command::pickup) plzz helpp i am soo desperated
its an delta 2spced i guess help!!

item.title: Java hacker on server help! <------------
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

yea he could be on a cheat client. im not for sure cause idk how they work but thats what it sounds like. sorry idk how to fix it just ip ban or something or do what he^^ said and make it to were you can only log on with the client you have provided.

Read full topic

item.title: Java hacker on server help! <------------
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Just make it so your client needs YOUR client only.
Also, quit with the “:s”.

Read full topic
